mapper.select: SELECT u.user_challenge_id FROM user_challenges u LEFT JOIN diaries d ON u.diary_id = d.diary_id WHERE u.recommend_type = 'daily' AND d.register_date IS NULL AND recommend_date <= NOW()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_challenges(user_id, challenge_id, recommend_type, recommend_date) VALUES (#{userId}, IFNULL((SELECT challenge_id FROM diaries WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND challenge_id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT u.challenge_id FROM user_challenges u LEFT JOIN diaries d ON u.diary_id = d.diary_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND d.register_date IS NULL) GROUP BY challenge_id LIMIT 1), (SELECT challenge_id FROM challenges ORDER BY challenge_id LIMIT 1)), 'daily', #{recommendDate})
